name: An Ordinary Adventure: Redone
description:
This game is about a non-human being named SomeGuy. He was apparently created to be "perfect", and protect Earth from all harm. But when he realizes that the Earth is perfectly safe, he thinks that his existence is a mistake. So play as John as you go on an extremely usual adventure with SomeGuy to find out how he was created!

Arrow Keys/WASD - Move/Select
Down Arrow Key/S Key - Interact/Open doors
Space key - Enter/Go through dialogue
Holding the space key makes text go faster
X key - Skip dialogue 
1 key- Brightness down
2 key- Brightness up

-17 original music tracks
-Pixel art consistent through the whole game
-An Original Story
-A Moral
-Original characters
-5 months of effort!
